text: @PMOIndia @myogiadityanath @narendramodi Our Honorable Prime Minister I am from Asansol city of West Bengal. Here the cases of Covid-19 are increasing. It seems that in a few days, Asansol will become a hotspot area of ​​Covid-19. There is negligence on the part of the administration here. Please do something for here
